result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ مِمَّآ أَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۗ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَلُومٗا مَّدۡحُورًا
result.translation: 39. Nabiyow too baxxaqqa koh haynem ku Rabbi wacyih koi oobiseemi madqooqii kee kassiisik, seehadaytow Yallâ luk aka Yalla agleh kaat mahin qibaadal, toysa jahannam girat qambisimettok, isi nafsii kee sinaamak massacakka luk, isi Rabbih Racmatak axxeerak.
